name.en: Budget Classification - Institution Codes (City of Buenos Aires)
name.local: Clasificación Institucional del Presupuesto de la Ciudad de Buenos Aires

description.en:
The annual budget of the City of Buenos Aires provides a classification of the agencies that form part of the city government. 

These budget identifiers can be used to construct an organisation identifier.

access.onlineAccessDetails: The list of agencies is provided in a resolution of government. This was last updated in 2009.
access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: The identifiers are provided under the heading 'Clasificación Institucional' and consist of dotted numbers.
